name: difference(from:by:)

declaration: func difference<C>(from other: C, by areEquivalent: (C.Element, Unicode.Scalar) -> Bool) -> CollectionDifference<Unicode.Scalar> where C : BidirectionalCollection, Unicode.Scalar == C.Element
